name: 比較文體論
description: 本課程旨在；中西文體比較、中西文類分析
goals: 讓學生具備文體、文類分析及研究能力
syllabus:
Tentative schecule:

1\. Introduction and Orientation

2\. Saintsbury, Chapters 1-2;褚斌杰，緒論\-第一章；_Ulysses_; counterpart in金堤譯。

3\. Saintsbury, Chapter 3; 褚斌杰，第二章；_Ulysses_; counterpart in金堤譯。

4\. Saintsbury, Chapter 4; 褚斌杰，第三章；_Ulysses_; counterpart in金堤譯。

5\. Saintsbury, Chapter 5; 褚斌杰，第四章；_Ulysses_; counterpart in金堤譯。

6\. Saintsbury, Chapter 6; 褚斌杰，第五章；_Ulysses_; counterpart in金堤譯。

7\. Saintsbury, Chapter 7; 褚斌杰，第六章；_Ulysses_; counterpart in金堤譯。

8\. Saintsbury, Chapter 8; 褚斌杰，第七章；_Ulysses_; counterpart in金堤譯。

9\. Saintsbury, Chapter 9; 褚斌杰，第八章；_Ulysses_; counterpart in金堤譯。

10\. Saintsbury, Chapter 10; 褚斌杰，第九章；_Ulysses_; counterpart in金堤譯。

11\. Saintsbury, Chapter 11; 褚斌杰，第十章；_Ulysses_; counterpart in金堤譯。

12\. Discussion of paper topics; 褚斌杰，第十一章。_Ulysses_; counterpart in金堤譯。

13\. Discussion of paper topics; 褚斌杰，第十二章。_Ulysses_; counterpart in金堤譯。

A term paper of proper length is due at the end of the semester, in addition to class presentations.
